text: The Uganda national beach soccer team represents Uganda in international beach soccer competitions and is controlled by the FUFA, the governing body for football in Uganda. The Uganda national beach soccer team played their first game, in international friendly match, in December 2014, winning 6–5 to Zanzibar Sand Heroes Their second win came in the 2015 February 1 in the next friendly match against Kenya Sand Heroes in Mombasa, in which Uganda won against the hosts 7–6. ==Current squad== Correct as of 2015 Coach: Kebba Haruna ==Current Staff== * Head of Delegation: Abdul Hamid Juma ==References== Category:2014 establishments in Uganda Category:National beach soccer teams Beach soccer
title: Uganda national beach soccer team
